name: UP935732: Angry Comment Simulator
description:
Cry your opinions to the internet in this angry comment simulator by mashing a single key and watching in awe as your tiny character expands with rage!

Note: I apologise in advance if you find any of the comments at all offensive or hurtful in any way as this is designed to be a satirical and humorous experience.

Controls:
  • Z - Accept
  • WASD/Arrow Keys - Navigate Menus
  • Escape - Exit to main menu
  • F - Toggle fullscreen
